channel.title: Adding text in the game screen (Like timers etc.)
channel.description: Hi, i want to be able to add text on the bottom left of the screen. Like the text in the warriors guild, runescape: [img]http://i1261.photobucket.com/albums/ii585/jake_bellotti/text.jpg[/img] So wherever i go, it will have on the bottom of the screen (Not the chatbox) Pkpoints: (amout of points) Any help is appreciated. Thanks.

item.title: Adding text in the game screen (Like timers etc.)
item.dc:creator: @magemaniac33 magemaniac33
item.description:
@magemaniac33 wrote:

Well depending on where it is you may want to add it to your cache such as the sprites.

Read full topic
